events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request due to the customer receiving an incorrect item.
A customer service agent was assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with your refund process.
Could you please provide the order number and photos of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Here is my order number 987654321 and attached are the photos showing the incorrect item that arrived.
Thank you for the details. We will process a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and refund confirmation. I appreciate your help resolving this issue fast.
The refund has been approved and initiated. Please allow a few days for the amount to reflect in your account.
Just checking in to confirm you received your refund successfully and if there is anything else we can assist with.
Since the refund was completed and no further issues were reported, this case is now closed. Thank you!
